title: Hello i need an answer to my question please! :)
body: Is it possible to get an old name from an old account that got permanently banned say like 2-3 years ago? not the username, just the name. Because i have a permanent banned account and i miss the name that i had and i would love to get it back, i don't care about the account, i don't want it, i would just love to have the name back.

replies.body:
You'd have to wait for the name to become inactive. Assuming it was a level 30 account, it would be 2 years and 6 months from the day you stopped playing matches. You can find more about how this works in our [Summoner Name Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914).

Let me know if you have any questions.
